description:
Dollars is a gang originally founded online by http://anidb.net/ch12150 [Mikado] and some of his friends. As information about them is spread by http://anidb.net/ch12153 [Izaya] the organisation rapidly gains momentum and becomes a force to be reckoned with. Some of the members include Simon, Shizuo, Kadota, Karisawa, Izaya and Selty.
Note: Episode 11 reveals that http://anidb.net/ch1775 [Isaac Dian] and http://anidb.net/ch1776 [Miria Harvent] from the http://anidb.net/a4897 [Baccano!] series are also part of the gang.
name: Dollars
